metadata.title: CVE-2021-34548 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Tor before 0.4.6.5, aka TROVE-2021-003. Anattacker can forge RELAY_END or RELAY_RESOLVED to bypass the intendedaccess control for ending a stream.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-34548` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.4.7.10-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.4.7.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.7.10-1').
